library:
<class name="kut_ugv_lasers/StatisticalRoadFilter" type="kut_ugv_lasers::StatisticalFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Filter based on pcl::StatisticalOutlierRemoval. Takes PointXYZIIndex as input and outputs PointXYZI.
<class name="kut_ugv_lasers/BypassFilter" type="kut_ugv_lasers::BypassFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Output of the filter is equal to its input
